A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Typical Hollywood now. Take something good and make it bad. Just like Saturday night live is no longer funny\, Star Wars is not good. Weak characters\, none are amazing like the old.  Rey\, Finn\, supreme leader\, Kylo Ren are all bad characters with nothing special about them. It's typical bad Hollywood writers today\, who either have a horrible political agenda to get thumbs up from liberal critics or just plain ruin a good thing. My wife thought it was entertaining somewhat but I was not feeling any of it. Really bad writing.
